14#ifndef NAMED_MAIN_H
15#define NAMED_MAIN_H 1
16
17/*! \file */
18
19#ifdef ISC_MAIN_HOOK
20#define main(argc, argv) bindmain(argc, argv)
21#endif
22
23/*
24 * Commandline arguments for named; also referenced in win32/ntservice.c
25 */
26#define NAMED_MAIN_ARGS "46A:c:d:D:E:fFgL:M:m:n:N:p:sS:t:T:U:u:vVx:X:"
27
28ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE void
29named_main_earlyfatal(const char *format, ...)
30ISC_FORMAT_PRINTF(1, 2) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
31
32void
33named_main_earlywarning(const char *format, ...) ISC_FORMAT_PRINTF(1, 2);
34
35void
36named_main_setmemstats(const char *);
37
38#endif /* NAMED_MAIN_H */
